aa2.details:
The CSUN Campus Diversity Management Application. This Laravel application is used by CSUN HR to keep track of staff hires.

Role in the project
  • Scrum Master
  • Developer

Screenshot

etd.description: Graduate Student's Thesis and Dissertaion manager.
etd.details:
The CSUN Electronic Thesis and Dissertation Application. This Laravel application is used by both CSUN Master's Students and academic advisors to keep track and manage the Masters Student's thesis progress from start to finish.

Role in the project
  • Mentor

Screenshot

faculty.details:
Showcasing CSUN's unique Faculty. This Laravel application is used to highlight CSUN's diverse Faculty as well as serve as a hub for students to easily find their Faculty's office hours, sillabi, research interests, and contact information.

Role in the project
  • Developer

Screenshot

scholarship.description: A place where Faculty can showcase their projects, research ∓ expertise.
scholarship.details:
A place where CSUN's Faculty can link their projects, interests & expertise. This Laravel application showcases the many projects that are happening throughout the campus. CSUN individuals have the ability to join the project as a student, staff or faculty and display that fact to the world.

Role in the project
  • Developer

Screenshot

mom.details:
CSUN META+LAB website explains what META+LAB is and what our primary product is - our students.

Role in project
  • Scrum Master
  • Mentor
  • Product Owner
  • Developer


Screenshot
